name: MaxGoesWild
description:
This is a simple game I made while I started to learn to use Godot.

Controls:
- Use arrow keys to move/jump
- Use spacebar to shot

To create this game I used the following assets:
- PaperPixel by VEXED (CC0)
- Next to You, Eye of the Storm by Joth (CC0)

Special thanks to:
- My Panda

Made by CodeSailer
